title.rendered: Minecraft for Windows Download – free – CHIP

content.rendered:
last changes

After a long time it has finally happened: the finale Version 1.0 Windows version of Minecraft is now available for download. This not only removes the beta badge, but also brings with it numerous innovations that finally make the game appear as a full-fledged offshoot. For example, the end including ender dragons & Co. is now on board, it can be built up to a height of 256 blocks and some new animals and plants are integrated – cool!

The open-world all-time hit Minecraft is finally coming to Windows.

The dealer may pay a commission for links on this page, eg for links marked with or green underlining. More info.

Minecraft for Windows The cult game Minecraft has now also been released as a Windows app. If you’ve already bought the game for PC or Mac, you can even get the beta completely free.

Minecraft for Windows: The building continues

Minecraft offers you a huge world made entirely of blocks that you can mine, combine and craft. This gives you endless possibilities to change the existing world according to your ideas. Of course, the game is not just pure building fun – evil creatures appear at night, from which you have to protect yourself with a specially built shelter. In addition to houses and caves, you can also create tools, weapons, farms, forts, boats and much more.
